description: The round payoff this round was 1. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -1.

The game has a structure where mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) results in no payoff, while mutual defection (both choosing option 2) leads to significant negative payoffs. This suggests that players may be incentivized to choose option 1 to avoid losses, especially since the other player (Llama-3.3-70B) defaults to option 1.
The previous round indicates that choosing option 1 can lead to a loss if the other player chooses option 2, highlighting the risk of unilateral cooperation.
The knowledge of each player's default action may lead to strategic adjustments in future rounds, as both players are aware of the potential consequences of their choices.
